gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਲਗ ਮਾਤ੍ਹੀਨ ਪੜਤ ਅੳੁਰ ਕੳੁ ਅੳੁਰ ਪਿਤਾ ਪੂਤ ਪੂਤ ਪਿਤਾ ਸਮਸਰਿ ਜਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Lag Maatraheen Parhat Aur Kau Aura , Pitaa Poot Poot Pitaa Samasari Jaaneeai ?
translation: Just as a word devoid of vowel symbol would sound different, word 'pita' and 'putt' would be read alike.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਰਤਿ ਬਿਹੂਨ ਜੈਸੇ ਬਾਵਰੋ ਬਖਾਨੀਅਤ ਅੳੁਰ ਕਹੇ ਅੳੁਰ ਕਛੇ ਹਿਰਦੈ ਮੈ ਅਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Surati Bihoon Jaisay Baavaro Bakhaaneeata , Aur Kahay Aur Kachhay Hiradai Mai Aaneeai ?
translation: Just as a person is called demented when not in his full senses, he understands different than what is being said.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਗੁੰਗ ਸਭਾ ਮਧਿ ਕਹਿ ਨ ਸਕਤ ਬਾਤ ਬੋਲਤ ਹਸਾੲਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਬਚਨ ਬਿਧਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Goung Sabhaa Madhi Kahi N Sakat Baata , Bolat Hasaai Hoi Bachan Bidhaaneeai ?
translation: Just as a mute person cannot express himself in any gathering, even if he tries to utter a word, he becomes a laughing stock for all,

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਾਰਗ ਮੈ ਮਨਮੁਖ ਥਕਤ ਹੁੲਿ ਲਗਨ ਸਗਨ ਮਾਨੇ ਕੈਸੇ ਮਾਨੀਅੈ ॥੨੬੪॥
transliteration: Gurmukhi Maarag Mai Manamoukh Dakat Hui , Lagan Sagan Maanay Kaisay Maaneeai ?264?
translation: No self-oriented or self-willed person can tread the path of Guru-conscious persons. How can one feel persuaded to tread the path of Guru-conscious people when one is bound by the omens-good or bad. (264)
